pr_title: FCREPO-3541 - Etags reflect membership and other request preferences

timeline.author: pwinckles
pwinckles

timeline.message: Compute RDF etags based on state token, serialization, prefer headers, last modified timestamps for containment and membership. Store last updated timestamps for membership relations
Add integration tests. Handle last_updated for mementos.
Remove baking of containment last_updated into state token since its now being included during etag calculation
Add more etag testing, move some DirectContainer tests, enable one of them and update it
